name: notdnd
description: Notdnd scaffold: Roll20 + D&D Beyond mechanics with AI GM placeholders

scripts.check: for f in $(rg --files -g '*.js' -g '*.mjs' src server tests scripts); do node --check "$f" || exit 1; done
scripts.verify: npm run check && npm run test
scripts.verify:full: npm run verify && npm run smoke && npm run e2e
